entry.title: TODO List
entry.content:
Here is some resources which could be used to learn from source code, if you have more useful resource and would like to share with us, just email me. Thx :)

TODO list

  • leveldb

LevelDB is a fast key-value storage library written at Google that provides an ordered mapping from string keys to string values.

  • Labs of Computer Networks

  • SICP

Finished

  • Rumination On C++

There is a famous book about C++ – << Ruminations On C++ >>. It’s a pity that the demo in this book is not runnable and not easy for us to understand. So I rewrite some basic functions. If you are reading this book, you could use this repository.

  • JOS in 2014

Here you could get the source code of JOS which was rewrited for teaching. If you are chinese, you could also get the study notes of me from my old blog in CSDN.
